title: Design Education Course Utilizing Flipped Learning in Online Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic design principles understanding and digital tool usage experience
context.additional_context: Conducted in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments, focusing on enhancing practical application skills for professionals

learning_goals: Learners can autonomously perform design projects from planning to execution via a flipped learning model
Learners can improve design outcomes at least three times through peer feedback and instructor evaluations
Learners can understand and apply core design concepts at over 80% proficiency using lecture videos produced on smartphones in an online learning environment

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
